类 ElectricVehicle

java.lang.Object
ElectricVehicle
public class ElectricVehicle extends Object
Represents an Electric Vehicle (EV) with battery, efficiency, and state-of-charge related behaviors.

  • 构造器概要

    构造器
    构造器
    说明
    ElectricVehicle(String name, double batterySize, double stateOfCharge, double defaultEfficiency)
    Constructs an ElectricVehicle with the given parameters.

  • 构造器详细资料

    • ElectricVehicle

      public ElectricVehicle(String name, double batterySize, double stateOfCharge, double defaultEfficiency)
      Constructs an ElectricVehicle with the given parameters.
      参数:
      name - the name of the EV; if null or empty, defaults to "unknown EV"
      batterySize - battery size in kWh (10–150)
      stateOfCharge - state of charge as a decimal (0.15–1.0)
      defaultEfficiency - default efficiency (0.5–4.5)

  • 方法详细资料

    • getEfficiency

      public double getEfficiency()
      Returns the current efficiency of the EV.
      返回:
      current efficiency

    • getBatterySize

      public double getBatterySize()
      Returns the battery size.
      返回:
      battery size in kWh

    • getStateOfCharge

      public double getStateOfCharge()
      Returns the current state of charge.
      返回:
      state of charge as a decimal

    • getName

      public String getName()
      Returns the name of the EV.
      返回:
      EV name

    • setStateOfCharge

      public void setStateOfCharge(double newStateOfCharge)
      Updates the state of charge.
      参数:
      newStateOfCharge - new state of charge value

    • range

      public double range()
      Calculates the estimated driving range.
      返回:
      estimated range

    • updateEfficiency

      public void updateEfficiency(double currentTemp)
      Updates the current efficiency based on the current temperature.
      参数:
      currentTemp - temperature in Fahrenheit

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Returns a string representation of this ElectricVehicle.

      The returned string includes the vehicle name, the current state of charge expressed as a percentage (with one decimal place), and the estimated range in miles (with one decimal place).

      Format: Name SOC: XX.X% Range (miles): YY.Y

      覆盖:
      toString 在类中 Object
      返回:
      a formatted string describing the EV
